patthana8.31:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
patthana8.31:0.3_0: of tied up to the neck, and the yoke with mindfulness.
patthana8.31:1.1_0: tied up yokes of the yoke with yokedness, poles, or the necklaces.
patthana8.31:1.1_1: tied up yokes of the yoke with yokedness, poles, or the necklaces.
patthana8.31:1.1_2: tied up yokes to the necklaces or yokes. It’s not possible to go all the way around.
patthana8.31:2.1_0: tied up yoke the necklaces, yokedness, or to go all the way around.
patthana8.31:3.1_0: movements on the mountain, but doesn’t arrived at the root of ties or the plenty of goblins. And it doesn’t give rise to the principle.
patthana8.31:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana8.31:5.1_0: The group of six on “takes” is finished.
